files.content:
module "eks" {
  source  = "terraform-aws-modules/eks/aws"
  version = "~> 20.0"

  cluster_name    = var.name
  cluster_version = var.cluster_version

  vpc_id     = module.vpc.vpc_id
  subnet_ids = module.vpc.private_subnets

  cluster_endpoint_public_access  = true
  cluster_endpoint_private_access = true

  enable_cluster_creator_admin_permissions = true

  eks_managed_node_groups = {
    default = {
      name            = "default"
      instance_types  = var.node_instance_types
      min_size        = var.node_min_size
      max_size        = var.node_max_size
      desired_size    = var.node_desired_size
      subnet_ids      = module.vpc.private_subnets
      capacity_type   = "ON_DEMAND"
      ami_type        = "AL2_x86_64"
      disk_size       = 20

      # Allow nodes to reach the internet via NAT for pulling images and CDNs.
      create_security_group = true
    }
  }

  # Required for AWS Load Balancer Controller (IRSA)
  enable_irsa = true
}

aws_region = "us-east-1"
name       = "btry-indi"

# Use a pinned, immutable tag in real environments (e.g., git SHA) instead of latest.
app_image    = "yash5090/btry-indi:latest"
app_replicas = 3

# Optional HTTPS/DNS (leave empty to skip)
domain_name    = ""
hosted_zone_id = ""

enable_waf = false
